channel.title: A Little help compiling... :/ and another question
channel.description:
Okay i downloaded Jdk 6update13 and i need some help with the environmentable variables. Can i have the codes for Jdk 6u13? and im on vista so when i choose [Enviromental Variables] Do i put the codes in the top box, or in bottom box Top box says- Edit Environmental Variables for Tehlobbiescape bottom says- Edit System Environmental Variables
Okay I need the one that is "classpath" and "CLASSPATH" and "PATH" THX, also what will it say if i have compiled correctly?
AND LAST THING!!, I made a silabsoft hamachi server, but my friends do not know how to log on, well, i can log on because i dont need server password... but here MAIN PROBLEM-Where do i put the hamachi server password? _______________________ Username:Lobbiescape Password:******** Server ip:5.175.210.157 Port:43594 _______________________ Okay so when they log in it says "Error connecting to server" but idk where to put the server pass on silab servers so help please?
But do i have to compile to let friends play,or can they just play?

item.title: A Little help compiling... :/ and another question
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

Here is the

Path

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\

CLASSPATH

.;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

Hope i helped

Read full topic

item.description:
@system wrote:

eh… what? you want to compile your server? javac *.java

and your friends need hamachi to play to…

item.title: A Little help compiling... :/ and another question
item.dc:creator: @tehlobbiescape tehlobbiescape
item.description:
@tehlobbiescape wrote:

Okay i downloaded Jdk 6update13 and i need some help with the environmentable variables. Can i have the codes for Jdk 6u13?
and im on vista so when i choose [Enviromental Variables] Do i put the codes in the top box, or in bottom box
Top box says- Edit Environmental Variables for Tehlobbiescape
bottom says- Edit System Environmental Variables

Okay I need the one that is “classpath” and “CLASSPATH” and “PATH” THX, also what will it say if i have compiled correctly?

AND LAST THING!!, I made a silabsoft hamachi server, but my friends do not know how to log on, well, i can log on because i dont need server password… but here
MAIN PROBLEM-Where do i put the hamachi server password?

Username:Lobbiescape
Password:********
Server ip:5.175.210.157
Port:43594

Okay so when they log in it says “Error connecting to server” but idk where to put the server pass on silab servers so help please?

But do i have to compile to let friends play,or can they just play?

Read full topic
